statements: SELECT * FROM team_roster WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT player_name, position FROM team_roster;
SELECT team_id, player_name FROM team_roster WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT * FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM team_roster WHERE is_active = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM team_roster WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, position FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_id, player_name, position FROM team_roster WHERE position = 'Forward' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM team_roster WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' AND position = 'Goalkeeper';
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM team_roster GROUP BY team_id HAVING total_players > 2 ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, active_players FROM team_roster WHERE active_players > 5;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player_info WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, active_players FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT team_name, active_players, player_positions ->> 'forward' AS forward_players FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, active_players FROM team_roster WHERE active_players >= 10 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS player_count FROM team_roster JOIN player_info ON team_roster.team_id = player_info.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player_info WHERE team_id = 2 AND position = 'Midfielder';
SELECT team_name, SUM(active_players) AS total_players FROM team_roster GROUP BY team_name HAVING SUM(active_players) > 20 ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_roster;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM team_roster ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM game WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_roster;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM team_roster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS player_count FROM team_roster JOIN player ON team_roster.team_id = player.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT game_date, team1_id, team2_id FROM game WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY game_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM team;
SELECT team_id, coach_name, team_name FROM team;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT game_date, location FROM game ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM player JOIN game_player ON player.player_id = game_player.player_id;
SELECT * FROM team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS player_count FROM team JOIN player ON team.team_id = player.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, AVG(game_score) AS average_score FROM team JOIN player ON team.team_id = player.team_id JOIN game_player ON player.player_id = game_player.player_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_name, game_date FROM player JOIN game_player ON player.player_id = game_player.player_id JOIN game ON game_player.game_id = game.game_id WHERE game_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM Team;
SELECT team_name FROM Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE position='Forward';
SELECT team_id, COUNT(player_id) as total_players FROM TeamRoster GROUP BY team_id HAVING COUNT(player_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player JOIN TeamRoster ON Player.player_id = TeamRoster.player_id WHERE TeamRoster.team_id = '09876543-2109-8765-4321-098765432109';

SELECT team_name, position_name FROM Team JOIN TeamPosition ON Team.team_id = TeamPosition.team_id JOIN Position ON TeamPosition.position_id = Position.position_id ORDER BY team_name ASC, position_name DESC;

SELECT Team.team_name, Player.player_name, Position.position_name FROM Team JOIN TeamRoster ON Team.team_id = TeamRoster.team_id JOIN Player ON TeamRoster.player_id = Player.player_id JOIN Position ON Player.position = Position.position_name WHERE Team.team_id = '12345678-9876-5432-8765-321098765432';
